20550.「修行にかこつけて また 何か\n <pc>に ロクでもないことを\n させよう:
You're not trying to get <pc> here
to do something stupid for you again
pretending it's really training, are you?

20551.「……チッ！\n うるせーのが 来やがった。:
Tch! So the loudmouth shows himself yet
again!

20552.「<pc>。この間みたいに\n 借金のカタに 売られそうになったりしたら\n オ:
If you find yourself about to be sold off to
settle some debt like before, you come
and talk to me instead.

20553.「ちげえって！ 今回は なんと\n <pc>のファンからの ご指名で\n 仕事の:
No way! This time it was actually one of <if_woman>her<else>his<endif>
fans that asked me to do this for them!

20554.「……ふむ。名前も名乗らずに 呼びだして\n 仕事の内容も 現地で説明か……\n:
Hrrrmm... Not even giving a name nor
explaining what the job actually is...
Sounds sketchy if you ask me.

20555.「まあ むこうにも都合が あるのかもな？\n それより ご指名で 仕事を依頼して:
Well, I suppose they have their reasons,
right? Quite the accomplishment to have fans
who want your help!

20556.「とりあえず 依頼人に会ってみて\n あんまり 怪しい依頼なら 断ればいいさ。\:
Anyways, you should go meet with them and
just refuse it if it seems too suspicious. You
can judge that for yourself.

20557.「……ぐぬぬっ。おのれ セインズ。\n これじゃ 誰が <pc>の師匠か\n わ:
Rgghh... That damn Sainz...
I'm <pc>'s master, NOT you!

20558.「おお これは <pc>選手。\n このような遠方まで よく来てくださいました。:
Oh, you must be <pc>.
Thank you for coming all the way out
here.

20559.「私は ワケあって名前は 明らかにできない\n さる人物の 代理人を務める者です:
I work for a certain individual and for
certain reasons cannot their name to you.
Yes, I am indeed talking about your fan.

20560.「では さっそく 仕事の話に入りましょう。\n 今回の依頼は 難しいものではない:
Now then, I'll cut right to the chase. This
isn't a difficult request, but it's something
only a battlemaster is able to do...

20561.「そこで 我が主の意向により\n あなたに 白羽の矢が立ったというわけです。:
And so, by my master's will, you were chosen
for this task.

20562.「この洞くつに出現する <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n とうこん討ちを使:
The Direlogs that roam this cave leave behind
a special flower called a "Moonlight Flower",
but only when finished off with Clap Trap.

20563.「この花には 赤 白 青の３色がありまして。\n あなたへの依頼というのは この:
These flowers come in three colors: red,
white, and blue. Your task is to collect one
of each.

20564.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という\n バトルマスター専用の\:
Your reward for this is a special headband
that only battlemasters may use.

20565.「おお ありがとうございます！\n さすがは 我が主の見込んだ方ですな。:
Oh, thank you! My master was right to choose
you after all.

20566.「それでは 私は いったん \n 失礼させていただきます。\n いろいろと 忙し:
Now if you would please excuse me for a
moment... I'm quite busy.

20567.「月光の花が ３色 集まった頃に\n また ここへ来ますので あなたも\n こち:
Once you have gathered the three colors of
Moonlight Flowers, please meet me back
here.

20568.「それでは また後ほど。\n くれぐれも よろしくお願いしますよ。:
We will meet again soon.
Thank you for your cooperation.

20569.「おお ありがとうございます！\n ……と言いたいところですが どうやら\n 他:
Oh, thank you! ...is what I want to say.
However, it seems you're a bit busy handling
some other requests.

20570.「さすがは 我が主の見込んだ方。\n 引く手あまたということですな。:
My master knows well who to take interest in,
and you are no exception. Your services
appear to be in high demand.

20571.「さあ はやく 他の頼みごとを片付けてきて\n また ここまで 来てくださいね。:
Now, please hurry and finish your other
business before coming back here.

20572.「なんと！ それは 困りましたな。\n 私も 主の手前 断られたからといって\n:
Oh, my! This certainly puts me in a difficult
position. Even if I'm turned down, I can't
just say "Well, that's that then"...

20573.「しかし ここで にらみあってても仕方ない。\n もし 考えが変わったら また:
Well, there's no point in just standing here
and staring at one another. If you change your
mind, do consider coming back.

20574.「おお。来てくださったということは\n 今度こそ 我が主からの依頼を\n 引き受:
Oh! You've come back. Does this mean you
will accept my master's request?

20575.「この洞くつに出現する <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n とうこん討ちを使:
The Direlogs that roam this cave leave behind
a special flower called a "Moonlight Flower",
but only when finished off with Clap Trap.

20576.「この花には 赤 白 青の３色がありまして。\n あなたへの依頼というのは この:
These flowers come in three colors: red,
white, and blue. Your task is to collect one
of each.

20577.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という\n バトルマスター専用の\:
Your reward for this is a special headband
that only battlemasters may use.

20578.「どうやら ３色の 月光の花を\n 集めてきていただけたようですね。\n さあ:
I see you've collected the flowers I've
requested. Would you please give them to
me?

20579.<pc>は 代理人に\n３色の 月光の花を 渡した！:
<pc> hands the man the three
Moonlight Flowers!

20580.「……確かに 受け取りました。\n これで 貴重な花束が 作れますよ。\n フフ:
Very good. Now you'll be able to make that
precious bouquet. Hehehe...

20581.「それでは こちらが 約束の報酬です。\n どうぞ お受け取り下さい。:
And here is the reward I promised.
Please take it.

20582.「では 私は これで\n 失礼させていただきます。\n なにせ 忙しい身でしてね:
Now, if you'll excuse me. I am quite busy and
have other matters to attend to.

20586.「どうも こいつら 正気じゃねーみてえだ。\n 今は 下手に刺激しないほうが い:
It looks like they're not right in the head.
Better that you don't agitate them!

20587.「……なるほど。アンタから臭ってくる\n 独特の香りが デンタザウルスを\n コ:
I see... Whatever that aroma is coming from
you seems to be exciting them.

20588.「とりあえず 緊急措置だ！\n 悪く思うなよ。:
Alright, I wouldn't normally do this.
Don't take it the wrong way!

20589.仮面バスターは <pc>に\nどくどくヘドロを 振りかけた！:
The Maskmaster covers <pc> in
Manky Mud!

20590.辺りに きつい臭いが広がって\nデンタザウルスたちは\nクモの子を散らすように:
A strong smell wafts through the area, causing
the Tortoceratops to scurry away like spiders!

20591.「……ほう 月光の花集めね。\n そんな仕事を 頼まれてたのか。:
Huh...so you were asked to collect Moonlight
Flowers?

20592.「そういえば 聞いたことがあるぜ。\n ３色の 月光の花の香りが 混じると\n:
Come to think of it...I've heard that when three different-colored Moonlight Flowers come together, they create a scent that
attracts Tortoceratops.

20593.「おまけに デンタザウルスってのは\n 本来 この辺りには いない魔物だ。\n:
Also, Tortoceratops don't usually show up
around these parts. Where did they come
from, I wonder...

20594.「どうやら アンタ 何か面倒ごとに\n 巻き込まれたみたいだな。\n こりゃ 陰:
Seems to me like you've gotten yourself caught
up in some trouble. This reeks of a
conspiracy.

20595.「だが まずは どくどくヘドロの臭いを\n どうにかすべきだな。ここにいると \:
First you should deal with that smell, though.
Staying here is killing my nose, so I'm outta
here.

47403.「……どうでしょう？\n ３色の月光の花 集めてもらえますか？:
Well? Will you collect the three flowers for
me?

47404.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を\n 用意しております。どうでし:
A special headband for battlemasters will be
your reward if you help me with this task.
Well? Will you get the flowers for me?

47405.「……どうでしょう？\n ３色の月光の花 集めてもらえますか？:
Well? Will you collect the three flowers for
me?

47406.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を\n 用意しております。どうでし:
A special headband for battlemasters will be
your reward if you help me with this task.
Well? Will you get the flowers for me?
